original_text: Nevertheless Elnathan and Delaiah and Gemariah had made intercession to the king that he would not burn the roll: but he would not hear them.
korean_text: 엘라단과 들라야와 그마랴가 왕께 두루마리를 불사르지 말도록 아뢰어도 왕이 듣지 아니하였으며

sentences.original_text: Nevertheless Elnathan and Delaiah and Gemariah
had made intercession to the king
that he would not burn the roll
but he would not hear them
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그는 그들의 말을 듣지 않았다
